name: Tricky Horse Jump Racing Game
summary: Become a horse rider racer and perform ultimate stunts over hurdles & obstacles in Tricky Horse Jump Racing Game. Step into the stunt arena & run hard, reach for the finish line as you jump over classic jumping hurdles in Horse race and horse show jump 3d simulator. Enjoy horse riding and racing, pick your own beautiful steed and knock down all rival and foes and win the championship in this horse racing. The derby quest 2018 of horse racing has been started.
